name: Laser Spies
description:
This game is part of series wherein I make one prototype per week based on a theme. 

Prototype Week # 9 : Make a game in a mood/genre/style decided on by the magic m@ Boch Slot Machine.  My genre was a bittersweet/spy/racing game. 

Laser Spies. Admittedly, I kind of interpreted the definition of "racing game" loosely.
